item.description:
Members,

We will have our next meet on February 21st from 12:30 to 4:30 pm at Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer Street,, MA (508) 429 1500.

Because we had so many people attending last time, which was so wonderful, I'm going to ask people to sign up for 2 different time periods, 12:30 to 2:30pm and 3:00 - 5:00 pm to make sure we have enough chairs and enough room for the dogs to play. I am putting an RSVP list together, and there will be a limit of 20 people per time slot, so please letme know if and when you'd like to come.

Please let me know what type of food or beverage you'd like to bring.

You can RSVP on the meetup.com site, but also please send me an email to let me know: laptopmaltese@aol.com.

On other subjects:

1) Anne Byers, the director of Holliston Meadows and her husband just gave birth to a new baby boy, William two weeks ago. 8 lbs 6 oz. This is grandpa Dr. Poling's FIRST grandchild!!! He and his family own Holliston Meadows and Holliston Animal Hospital and many of you know him.

2) Holliston Meadows has two brother Maltese that are 3 years old up for adoption. They are such sweethearts, already neutered, and Pete Westland is giving them training lessons right now so they will come with that advantage. He says they are doing unbelievably well with the training. Pete and I think that they should be adopted by separate homes so that they get a lot of individual attention and focus on their new owners and vice versa. If you are interested, please call Pete at (508) 429 1500.

3) I'm trying to convince Pete Westland to come to our meet again, and I think he is interested in attending some time in the near future! He was absolutely so wonderful at our first meet in Holliston and paid a lot of very nice attention to those owners and dogs attending!

Smalll dog best,
Kim
508 561 6881

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEETUP SUNDAY February 21, 12:30 pm - 5 pm
